mapper.insert: insert into manager ( manager_id, pw, email, manager_name, phone_number, in_date, role ) values ( #{managerId}, #{pw}, #{email}, #{managerName}, #{phoneNumber}, NOW(), #{role} )
mapper.update: update manager set pw=#{pw}, email=#{email}, manager_name=#{managerName}, phone_number=#{phoneNumber} where manager_id = #{managerId}
